title: Champions who handle Zed, Diana, and Leblanc
body:
My favorite mid laner is Orianna, and she for the most part isn't easily countered but I can sometimes find myself having trouble with those three champions.
Zed: Hard to punish him for missing skill shots and bad engage due to not having mana and lots of escapes
Diana: Orianna's mid range fighting is exactly where Diana likes to engage from
Leblance: Ew I just don't like it

I'm not even particularly interested in hard counters, just champions who still bring good damage and utility to the team.

replies.body: {{champion:127}} does good against them all, although do keep in mind that these days, the LB match up isn't as easy anymore. You really need to juke the E, otherwise she can make it a 1 for 1 trade with ease.

{{champion:31}} 
Its so funny, they cant do anything to kill you.
LeBlanc just W-Es constantly at Level 2 and never lets you stack. :/

The idea is to cheese assassins that are squishy and need mobility. If leblanc w's in you w her so she can't go back or use her other abilities, you win the trade and have ~15 seconds to heal off minions early on. Post 6 you just instakill most assassins with a full combo.

The trick is that you can out roam cho pretty hard and he has a hard time engaging if you avoid jumping on him.
